prompts: Create a bird-like Pokemon with sharp talons and vibrant feathers.
Imagine a fierce flying Pokemon with a menacing gaze and elongated wings.
Design a Pokemon that embodies speed, agility, and a striking color palette.
Show me a Pokemon that can soar through mountains and hunt in urban areas.
Make a Pokemon with a sleek body and powerful wings for aerial battles.
Generate a Pokemon that represents freedom and agility in the skies.
I want a majestic bird Pokemon that is both beautiful and intimidating.
